input.sentences: these are some amazing photos from our wedding day in the chapel !
me and my lovely husband walking down the aisle here .
him feeding me the cake before we dance .
and we danced the night away hor hours .
me dancing with my father later .
output.sentences: The couple wanted photos taken on the day of their wedding.
The lovely bride was documented during the ceremony and walking back up the aisle with her new husband.
Photos were even taken of the couple feeding each other cake on the dance floor.
There were many photos of the reception, as well, which carried on for hours into the night.
The bride's favorite photo, though, was the one of her dancing with her father.
